## User Flows

### First-Time Onboarding
1. Install Extension â†’ Welcome Screen
2. GitHub OAuth â†’ Permission Explanation

3. Actions: j/k navigate, s snooze, d mark read, o open

## Freemium Strategy

### Free Tier
- âœ… All filters
- âœ… 3 snoozes/day (preset times only)
- âœ… Basic auto-archive (1 rule)
- âœ… Keyboard shortcuts

### Pro Tier ($5/mo)
- ðŸ’Ž Unlimited snoozes
- ðŸ’Ž Custom snooze times
- ðŸ’Ž Unlimited auto-archive rules
- ðŸ’Ž Advanced filters

### Upgrade Triggers
1. Hit snooze limit: "You've snoozed 3/3 today. Upgrade for unlimited"
2. Try custom snooze: "Custom times are Pro-only"
3. After 14 days: "Stats: 340 notifs managed, 5 hours saved. Upgrade?"

## Viral Features

1. **Share Stats:** "I managed 247 GitHub notifications this week with @GitHubNotifMgr"
2. **Referral:** "Invite 3 friends â†’ 1 month free Pro"
3. **Review Prompt:** After 7 days: "Leave a 5-star review?"
